data.title: Best for Izakaya
data.text: Shiono-san's individual dishes are the best I have ever tasted   crab stuffed Shitake mushroom,  beef tartare, appetizer sampler, his Oden was great.   His sashimi is great most times.  ask him what he suggests.  His set dinner menu is average, but, his Izakaya dishes are very good to excellent.
